name: AVATARIKA
description: A virtual metropolis that never sleeps and is always online: in this lively, diverse and easily accessible city life simulator partying never stops. Socialize, date, hang out — anywhere, anytime, just the way you like it!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium® III 1,5 GHz or AMD Athlon® 1,5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 2 and higher  (32 MB graphic memory) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows 7 Processor: Intel Pentium® IV 2 GHz or AMD Athlon® 2GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 3, Radeon 8500 and higher (32 MB graphic memory) DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Sound Card: Onboard Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
